quotes.quote: Adorable children are considered to be the general property of the human race. Rude children belong to their mothers.
How lovely it is to dream while you are awake.
Lovely flowers are the smiles of god's goodness.
How lovely life can be if one takes time to be friendly.
Lovely flowers have been known to grow out of trash heaps.
What is lovely never dies, But passes into other loveliness.
A lovely face is the solace of wounded hearts and the key of locked-up gates.
Be adorable always to each other; respect is everlasting.
What makes you adorable is how much you're able to contribute towards the improvement of the lives of people around you
Why can't I be the adorable one?
It is not the most lovable individuals who stand more in need of love, but the most unlovable
A thing is lovable according as it is good. But God is infinite good. Therefore He is infinitely lovable.
You are lovable, you are loving; your choices about food will reflect that, if you give yourself a chance.
His captivating speech came not from his grammar or vocabulary but from the joy he took in wielding them well.

There is something captivating in spirit and intrepidity, to which, we often yield as to a resistless power; nor can he reasonably expect, the confidence of others who too apparently distrusts himself.
What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
It's lovely to know that the world can't interfere with the inside of your head.
How lovely goodness is in those who, stepping lightly, go smiling through the world.
How lovely are the portals of the night, when stars come out to watch the daylight die.
it would be lovely to sleep in a wild cherry-tree all white with bloom in the moonshine
It's lovely to have a part that requires you to learn something that's also interesting.
It was lovely when you found students who responded to things you were enthusiastic about.
It's lovely being a parent and being in a strong marriage with somebody who is your best friend.
It was lovely to see cynicism in one so young. It positively restored his faith in human nature.
It's lovely to be told you're wonderful by someone when you're used to being told how awful you are.
It's always lovely to be part of a project that, on a creative level, is done for all the right reasons.
It's just lovely to be involved in a movie that does go back to the basics - characters and great writing.
It is kind of lovely to be sitting alone, just thinking, very quiet, no one around. I don't feel alone or left out.
Nothing is more appealing than a handsome man who is also uncertain of himself.
Appealing workplaces are to be avoided. One wants a room with no view, so imagination can meet memory in the dark.
It's always appealing to play a character that has to overcome himself as well as an obstacle. It makes the drama so much deeper.
There is something very appealing about a room which one occupied as a child; it brings back one's childhood more vividly than anything else I know.
The most appealing part is the feeling of learning something true - the pleasure of a truth. For me, that's mostly found in philosophical literature at the moment.

What is appealing is the idea of attaining the unattainable and learning from it. Once you obtain a fantasy it becomes a reality, and that reality is not as exciting as your fantasy. Through the fantasies you learn to appreciate your own realities.
